Starbucks

Illustration, Interface Design

Starbucks wanted to update the photobooth in their Times Square store with a simplified custom solution.

After the project was completed, 400% more poeople were using it.

Starbucks was working on a new site called 'Coffee Passport', which allows partners to keep a journal on their coffee tasting, and unlock stamps as they try new roasts.

I designed a few of the stamps, as well as the app icon.
